attributes.additional_details:
This petition has been started to get the government to close the uk boarders untill they have cleared the back log of applications and to find the people who are in the country illegally
The uk has the most liberal imagination policys in the world where people know its easy to sit do noting and the state will provide for them.
While people who want to work cant get a job and when they do pay high taxes to support these people
Not against people coming to the uk if they put something back in
This great country that I am proud to be born
and bred in is drowning and needs to be rescued
Quick and want the government to act
If you agree with the things set out in the petition please sign so we can save our great nation
